subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Indianapolis Colts practiced again without the eight-time Pro Bowl receiver Marvin Harrison and may not have him against New England on Sunday. Harrison sat out for the second consecutive day with a bruised left knee that has forced him to miss two of the last three games. “If he doesn’t practice today, I’d say it’s doubtful he’ll play Sunday,” Coach Tony Dungy said before the workout.
